favourite.article: It's an amazing song & hymn. So wonderful to know thru this song that our comforter Jesus is alive and near us.

Learned this song in Church earlier this year and today it just kept occurring in my mind, my search for the lyrics led me here. Amazing how these words bring assurance and solace to people from so many parts of the world.
The Comforter has come don't need to bother about life issue. It is well with Every soul that needs Comfort.

Thank You Jesus for the promise of the Holy Spirit. The Spirit Divine, the matchless grace divine, thank You for our salvation. Praise the Lord, the Comforter has come!!! Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!
Such a beautiful song! I felt the move of the Holy Spirit from the first time I heard it....... Glory be to God for sending the Comforter to us!!!
Such a beautiful song! I felt the move of the Holy Spirit the from the first time I had it....... Glory be to God for sending the Comforter to us!!!
One of the most beautiful songs ever written.....
The most touching song that has ever been written....
A new song to me. Holy Ghost is using "Comforter Has Come" to comfort me. Playing it over and over inside me. I love Jesus.

A beautiful song: each time I sing it I see myself operating in a higher realm. The Holy Spirit is here truly teaching us all things and directing our paths. If you ain't yet filled with the Holy Spirit, please ask God to fill you. It's important for every true believer.
Beautiful song!

I found myself singing this song at home a few days ago and it brought back wonderful memories of my parents singing together at home while they were alive. My choir director called me yesterday and ask me to sing tonight at our praise and worship meeting, so here I am refreshing my memory. I cannot now explain the comfort it brings, the joy I find with Jesus no-one else could give. Praise be to God for His precious gifts, Jesus Christ our Savior and The Comforter the Holy Spirit.
Indeed the Comforter has come. Always around when we need Him. Thank You Lord.
Awesome Song. Without the Holy Spirit, we can not preach the Gospel. Lord, please help us in Jesus Name.

I just woke up singing this song over and over and my search led me here. "Oh spread the tidings 'round, wherever man is found". There is nothing like the joy and comfort that the Holy Spirit gives. It's overwhelming!
Wonderful song!

We rendered this hymn today in our ministers conference at Redemption Camp in Nigeria. The Comforter is indeed with us. As we enter the week of the convection tagged 'The Holy Spirit', may His presence fill our life like never before. The song is powerful. Thanks for uploading this song. Maranatha.
Thank God for the Holy Spirit. My prayer is that we will all go out and preach the Gospel. We will bring others to Christ in Jesus name. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless.

For many years I have come to love this classic hymn, and I cannot express enough how much this song has affected my life over the years. This hymn along with Constantly Abiding are among my all time favorite. The lyrics had to be divinely inspired. Glory to God!
This song is powerful. I have no better words to describe the magnitude of this song. The Comforter has come each day. When the Comforter is here the status changes from death to life. Hallelujah!
So comforting lyrics and music.... To God be the Glory... I remember my younger years. Now that I'm old near to face God through Jesus Christ our Lord.
This beautiful Frances Havergal hymn has been a comfort to me for years. Sadly it is not included in many hymnals.

I have been hearing this wonderful song for weeks first at night and now day and night; it has been such a comfort I can feel the peace of God settling on me as I continue through these difficulties... Truly He is my Comforter, my Guide, and my Keeper! Lord I will trust You, I can put all my trust in You! You have no limits; I love You & love Your company!

Comfort oh comfort My people, Says your God. Speak unto the heart of Jerusalem... What a great promise the Comforter has come, our Saviour upon leaving His disciples said, I will not leave you as orphans; I am coming to you....another Comforter, that He may be with you forever. We have the all-inclusive, life giving, compound, sevenfold Spirit as our daily portion. Wonderful!
